column7: As the door only operates for a short time (10secs?) the kWH value is low

column5: Blow Dryer, Hair Dryer, Hair Drier
Induction Stove,Induction Cooking Stove,Electric Cooker,Induction Cooktop
Smart Phone Charger,Cell Phone Charger,Mobile Phone Charger

column7:
In the EU, power consumption of Washing Machines is typically given in the form of Annual Power
Consumption. This is calculated based on 220 standard washing cycles, made up as follows:
60°C full load (3x), 60°C half load (2x), 40°C half load (2x) for 220 washing cycles.
